pages.title: Minecraft Comes Alive
pages.text: Say goodbye to Minecraft's annoying and boring villagers! Minecraft Comes Alive does just that - it breathes new life into the game by completely changing the villagers from 'caveman squidwards' into humans with professions, interractions & Relationships.$(br2)$(l:http://www.radix-shock.com/mca--how-to-play.html)MCA Guide$(/l)

pages.title: Features
pages.text: - 13 new professions.$(br2)- Over 500 unique skins.$(br2)- Villagers have genders and names.$(br2)- Talk to villagers.$(br2)- Build relationships, marry and have children.$(br2)- Trade using the default Minecraft trading system.
